md.name: descriptive
md.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"><dc:title xsi:type="dcterms:cs">Vývoj řeči kojenců v kolektivních zařízeních</dc:title><dcterms:translated xsi:type="dcterms:en">Speech development of suckling infants in infant institutes</dcterms:translated><dcterms:alternative></dcterms:alternative><dcterms:alternativeTranslated></dcterms:alternativeTranslated><dc:studyID> </dc:studyID><dc:creator>Kolečkářová, Linda</dc:creator><dcterms:dateofbirth></dcterms:dateofbirth><dc:subject>vývoj řeči</dc:subject><dc:description xsi:type="dcterms:en">My dissertation refers to suckling infants in infant institutes. I aimed at problems of their speech development. Former professional literature says that children from the infant institutes in comparison with children with parents who live together in harmony, have problems just with speaking. The reasons were caused by the lach of stimulation and by the absence of deeper emotional relations between a child and a nurse in the institute. During my practice in the infant institute in Kolín I was trying to find out how children´s faculties of speech are developed there. I found out that retarded children are those who miss an adequate emotional impact.</dc:description><dc:publisher>Univerzita Karlova v Praze</dc:publisher><dcterms:advisor>Housarová, Blanka</dcterms:advisor><dcterms:referee></dcterms:referee><dcterms:created xsi:type="dcterms:W3CDTF">2001-04</dcterms:created><dcterms:dateAccepted></dcterms:dateAccepted><dc:status></dc:status><dc:type>diplomová práce</dc:type><dc:format xsi:type="dcterms:IMT">application.pdf</dc:format><dc:identifier></dc:identifier><dc:language xsi:type="dcterms:ISO 639-1">cs</dc:language><dc:rights></dc:rights><dcterms:name>Mgr.</dcterms:name><dcterms:level></dcterms:level><dcterms:discipline></dcterms:discipline><dcterms:grantor>Univerzita Karlova v Praze. Pedagogická fakulta. Katedra speciální pedagogiky.</dcterms:grantor><dc:collection>dp</dc:collection><dc:collection></dc:collection><dc:subject>kojenec</dc:subject><dc:subject>kolektivní zařízení</dc:subject><dc:subject>speech development</dc:subject><dc:subject>infant</dc:subject><dc:subject>infant institute</dc:subject></record>
